Answer: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ASCII"?><QuestionFormAnswers xmlns="http://mechanicalturk.amazonaws.com/AWSMechanicalTurkDataSchemas/2005-10-01/QuestionFormAnswers.xsd"><Answer><QuestionIdentifier>not_wrong</QuestionIdentifier><FreeText>Because his paycheck was late in coming in, he asked for permission to pay me back later.</FreeText></Answer><Answer><QuestionIdentifier>wrong</QuestionIdentifier><FreeText>Because his paycheck was late in coming in, he did not pay me back.</FreeText></Answer></QuestionFormAnswers>
